system.description:
Grants immunity to certain poisons and provides a +2 bonus to saving throws against poison. The weakest version protects against poisons from creatures with 3 Hit Dice or less, while stronger versions counter poisons from more powerful creatures. Poisons avoided during the potion's duration have no effect after it ends.

Roll [[/br 1d10 #Counter poison type: 1-4=3HD, 5-7=7HD, 8-9=15HD, and 10=All types of poison.]] to determine which poisons it counters.

1-4: Protects against poisons from creatures of 3 Hit Dice or less.
5-7: Protects against poisons from creatures of 7 Hit Dice or less.
8-9: Protects against poisons from creatures of 15 Hit Dice or less.
10: Protects against all types of poison.

It lasts for 7-12 turns (1d6+6), with the exact duration known only to the DM.

A potion of poison is normally treated as poison from a 7-HD monster. The DM can adjust this option as necessary.
